nodes.text: The Eriadu veermok was a subspecies of veermok that could be found on Eriadu, a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories. While the regular veermok was a solitary and arboreal creature, the Eriadu subspecies was social and adapted to the dry conditions of plateaus. Additionally, the Eriadu veermoks were sleek-skinned and stood only a meter high, while the regular ones looked about twice the size of a human and were covered in woolly hair.
